response.original_title: Art of Native America: Earl Biss
response.overview: "Art of Native America: Earl Biss" reveals the artist's joyous, bold, tumultuous journey to success in the world of Art. A master painter and descendent of great Crow Chiefs, he brought inherent, ancient spiritual power to his dynamic oil paintings.
response.tagline: Descended from Crow Chiefs, a master painter brings ancient spiritual power to his Art and contributes to the rise of Contemporary Native American Art.
response.title: Art of Native America: Earl Biss
